thread.title: Lunar New Year Celebration Concludes Feb. 5 at Disney California Adventure Park
thread.title_full: Lunar New Year Celebration Concludes Feb. 5 at Disney California Adventure Park

author: Shawn Slater
title: Lunar New Year Celebration Concludes Feb. 5 at Disney California Adventure Park
text:
We’re in the final week of our fantastic Lunar New Year celebration at Disney California Adventure park, and today David Duffy, Director of Creative Entertainment for Disneyland Resort , gives us a look at everything the celebration has to offer. Throughout the day you can enjoy an impressive array of authentic live performances, visit with Disney characters dressed in traditional attire, take in the Happy Lunar New Year Procession featuring Mulan and Mushu, marvel at the “ Hurry Home ” pre-show to “ World of Color ,” and so much more!

You have just a few days left to experience the Lunar New Year celebration at Disney California Adventure park. This year’s celebration wraps up on Sunday, Feb. 5.
